data.text:
Curious about how air is circulated and filtered on our planes?⬇️
• High air exchange rate
• Airflow from ceiling to floor in circular pattern
• HEPA filters trap 99.9%+ of particulates
• Seat configurations act as barriers

entity.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
entity.description: A ten-year-old boy befriends and shelters a gentle alien creature who has been stranded on Earth. When the authorities are alerted to this unusual house guest, the boy tries to help the creature return home before menacing government agents close in. The film won three Academy Awards for music, sound and special effects.

data.text: Looking hot in Phoenix! https://t.co/ZAlOI8I9EL
Hello Phoenix! Now flying @gatewayairport @FlyYYC @FlyEIA @TorontoPearson @yvrairport #yyz #yeg #yvr #yyc https://t.co/AaNiZ3Mlop
👏👏👏 https://t.co/6tqURA44vl
Hello Palm Springs! Nonstop flights from Vancouver, Toronto and Edmonton! @flyPSP @FlyEIA @yvrairport @TorontoPearson https://t.co/yGJaQOvtdE
Even more first flights! Our inaugural flight from Halifax to Orlando today ✈️☀️ https://t.co/LhK2oLvCF3
☀️☀️☀️🎰 https://t.co/HP3PFLVqy7
🎉🎉🎉 https://t.co/2fX3GNgNpJ
Thanks for joining us for the milestone event! https://t.co/IHao9toVgc
RT @TRAVELCORRESPO1: Flair Airlines’ U.S. expansion continues as 17 transborder routes launch this week https://t.co/HUtItXYVGv
Looking sharp in our cheap sunglasses! Our crew for today’s inaugural flight from Calgary to Las Vegas. @LASairport @FlyYYC #flyflair https://t.co/SKwFoV7iol
Another first today: Flair’s first US flight from Abbotsford! #YXX to #LAS https://t.co/e3DP8sJ8LQ
Whew! Our first US flights today from Edmonton, Calgary, Waterloo and Abbotsford! 8 of 17 new routes have started. 8 more tomorrow.
🎉💚💚💚 https://t.co/KPvZvTT5FP
Its happening #YEG! Nonstop, low fares to Los Angeles/Burbank! @FlyEIA @fly_BUR https://t.co/rKYLwBUUU5
🎉🎉🎉 https://t.co/FW1RPoIBJF

data.text:
📢 Major Announcement: Our fleet is growing... again!
We are thrilled to announce the addition of 14 new Boeing 737 MAX 8 aircraft to our fleet as we grow to 30 aircraft by the end of 2023. For our full press release, visit https://t.co/17EfFFsiDF

We’re proud to team up with @NIMCAlly on this important initiative! Thank you #NotInMyCity 🙌🏼 https://t.co/AvLiX1O6Yx

urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text: We're keeping it real this holiday season with our usual ultra-low fares for an ultra-awesome holiday. Listen to this year's Holiday message from CEO @stephenjonesnz https://t.co/3FWL5bHlSa and find your ultra-low fare at https://t.co/t5Idioh302 https://t.co/uNedw48tnT
RT @FlyYKF: Operations at YKF have resumed following an investigation by Waterloo Regional Police Services yesterday afternoon and evening.…
Flair is currently working with authorities in an ongoing investigation at the Region of Waterloo International Airport and can provide the following statement: https://t.co/i1ZiPtKMqw

We're proud to announce our new partnership with #NotInMyCity to deliver human trafficking education and awareness to all Flair employees ✈️🌼
Thank you for helping make our skies safer @NIMCAlly! Check out our press release for more info: https://t.co/eIEy4ugelr https://t.co/lNiKvpgQv7
RT @NIMCAlly: Our specialized aviation course will equip Flair team members with skills to identify and help end #HumanTrafficking, and Fla…

data.text:
Is there ever a bad time for wine? Our answer is no. Book Flair flights to Kelowna #YLW from only $39.*
📷 @okgnsunshinetax https://t.co/W8fR9kfcWh
*Prices are one-way, per person for travel on 06/06/22, from YVR-YLW, including all taxes and fees. Limited seats and availability https://t.co/I703LBpzpH

urls.title: Customize & Book Cheap Flights to Ottawa | Flair Airlines
urls.description: Planning to fly to Ottawa? Fly solo or grab your favourite buddy and book cheap flights to Ottawa YOW. Book Flair Airlines now & save big!

data.text:
There is nothing more 'Winter in Canada' than a skate on the #RideauCanal in Ottawa. #DYK our capital is home to the world's largest natural skating rink (7km)? If you haven't been yet, now is the time! Save big & book your trip to #YOW today https://t.co/0S3mPt8eHf
📷 @twofiveo https://t.co/W7Y8xGvh11

This winter, ditch the snow and fly Flair to one of our sunny US destinations! Take advantage of our Vancouver Sun Sale and use promo code VAN40 to get 40% base fare on ALL YVR routes to the USA. Hurry, sale ends 11:59pm MT Dec. 8, 2021. Visit https://t.co/2mJdPatNCa and book...! https://t.co/mRUeRCHfUm
Last night’s sunset in Phoenix @gatewayairport https://t.co/dCnV9VmgP6
👏👏👏 https://t.co/yAIk1F0gJG
Vancouver, Edmonton and Calgary flights coming in two weeks! https://t.co/yyjo87KBbb
Hello Phoenix! Flair has arrived at AZA! @gatewayairport @TorontoPearson #FlyFlair 🇨🇦 https://t.co/qQp1MO95hu
RT @TRAVELCORRESPO1: Flair Airlines continues US network expansion with an inaugural flight to Phoenix https://t.co/SFOx3TRVis
